blackbox.experiment
===================

.. py:class:: experiment
    
    Saves parameters for each experiment. Experiment class is instantiated as *Appa*.

    .. py:method:: __init__()

        Initialize self.

    .. py:method:: set_number(number)

        Sets expnumber to *number*.
            
        :param number:
        :type number: str

    .. py:method:: set_type(exptype)

        Sets exptype to *exptype*.
            
        :param exptype:
        :type exptype: str

    .. py:method:: set_exptime(totaltime)

        Sets exptime to *totaltime*.

        :param totaltime:
        :type totaltime: int

    .. py:method:: set_savefile(savetofile)

        Sets savefile to *savetofile*.

        :param savetofile:
        :type savetofile: str
